Question
========

There are two predictors $x_{1}$ and $x_{2}$, which have medium correlations with response variable *y* but are uncorrelated with each other.  First $x_{1}$ put into the model, and then $x_{2}$ added.

Enter:

As $x_{2}$ added to the model will be SSE ... and the partial correlation $r_{yx1x2}$ will ...  the ordinary correlation $r_{yx1}$. 
Answerlist
----------
* Remain the same; be as large as
* Remain the same; be greater than
* Decrease; be as large as
* Decrease; be greater than

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
